annotationSet._instruction: Add all annotations that belong to this brain atlas version.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this brain atlas version exists in.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this brain atlas version.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this brain atlas version.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this brain atlas.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this brain atlas version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier version of this brain atlas version.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this brain atlas version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this brain atlas version.

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this brain atlas version.

terminology._instruction: Add the terminology used for this brain atlas version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this brain atlas version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this brain atlas version.
